productCategories.name: Bank
productCategories.description: I need a day to day transactional account

productLines.name: Accounts
productLines.description: Current accounts to suit your business needs

products.name: Business Current Account
products.shortDescription: A current account is the primary vehicle for managing the flow of funds in and out of an account.
salesHighlights: A current account provides easy access to funds
It supports widely accepted payment mechanisms, e.g. debit orders and electronic fund transfers.
It provides the facility to keep a record of transactions (statements are accessible)
It is a mechanism for accessing other, associated services.
Deposit and chequebooks can be offered in conjunction with the service.
It can be used as a billing account for various banking services, e.g. NetBank Business

products.name: NedTrust Account
products.shortDescription: The NedTrust product is an interest-bearing current account specifically designed for attorneys, to enable them to meet the requirements of the Attorneys Act 53, 1979 in respect of section 78 (1) - the Attorneys Act.
salesHighlights: Nedbank can perform the calculation and reconciliation of interest and charges, on behalf of the attorney and pay the net interest automatically to the Regional Law Society.
Attorneys are allowed to off-set certain bank charges and service fees (excluding VAT) against the interest earned, prior to transferring the net-interest to the Attorneys Fidelity Fund.

productLines.name: CashSolutions
productLines.description: A customised cash-handling service for your business.

products.name: Cash Online
products.description: Cash Online is an agile web solution for capturing cash deposits and cash withdrawals. It enables businesses currently using cash centres to make deposits or withdrawals through a cash-in-transit (CIT) carrier.
products.shortDescription: Cash Online is an agile web solution for the capturing of cash deposits and cash withdrawals.
salesHighlights: Secure login for users.
Capture deposits online.
Capture cash for cash requests online.
Receive the value of funds on the same day, even if it’s counted outside of core banking hours.
Tracking of a tamper-evident bag seal number online for enhanced security.
View and search for transactions, allowing for comprehensive management information.
Value-added services include cash acceptance devices, point-of-sale devices and a current account to process funds into.
benefits: Reduce time spent on reconciliation with online narrative capture.
Proactive cash centre participation ensures deposits are counted and not lost in transit.
Web-based printable audit trail allows for transactions to be checked instantly.
Enhanced manual cash banking processes allow for security and transparency..

value: Balances, statements, cheque/cash deposit images and cash management reports can be requested and reviewed
Statements can be downloaded and exported, instead of being printed
Batches of payments, transfers and collections can be created, imported and maintained

Single and bulk transactions can be captured and authorised by means of EFTs, future-dated and same-day-value (SDV) payment types and through the collection service. These payment and collection instruments with their different attributes enable beneficiary value to be provided or received earlier or on specific dates, with tracking capability.
Notifications can be used to inform a beneficiary of payment.
Beneficiaries and collectees can be added, imported and maintained.
With regard to self-service capabilities: client can reset user passwords, maintain and delete users, create nicknames for company accounts and customise proof of payment.

NBB provides flexible options such as self-imposed limits, account validations, single and dual authorisation for beneficiaries, collectees and users, account limits, settings and payments, eBill payments and transfers, combining safety measures and segregation of duty to ensure peace of mind. All collections allow for dual authorisation.
Security is a top priority with NBB, and therefore security tokens, software and hardware certificates and passwords are used.

products.name: Cash Vault
products.description: CashVault is an automated cash acceptance terminal that counts, validates and verifies the authenticity of cash before dropping it into a secure canister/bag.
products.shortDescription: CashVault is an automated cash acceptance terminal that counts, validates and verifies the authenticity of cash.
salesHighlights: Counts multiple denominations through a high speed bulk note feeder.
Includes the high-speed CashRay® 90 banknote validator.
Has an LCD graphic interface.
Caters for dual responsibility for bag removal, audit trails, tracking ability, receipt and report printing, segregation of duties, cash processing and online deposit information.
benefits: Reduce onsite cash-handling risk and improve operational efficiencies.
This device is ideal for businesses with a daily cash turnover of between R250 000 and R1 million.
Accounts are credited electronically in accordance with the selected value proposition (Value for Value, Canister Upliftment Value or Device Deposit Value).
Includes maintenance, support, training and seamless client service for this device.
Acts as a criminal deterrent as a result of better security.

productLines.name: ElectronicChannels
productLines.description: Highly secure internet-based electronic banking system.

products.name: Host-To-Host
products.description: A system that allows for smooth transaction data interchange, ideal for businesses that transact at high volumes and have technologically advanced infrastructure entrenched processes in the line-of-business system.
products.shortDescription: Streamline large transaction volumes and automation with a Host-to-host system
salesHighlights: Accommodates multiple service types, such as real-time transactions, same-day, one-day and two-day service, and early debit orders.
Manages working capital.
Accommodates high and low-volume transaction processing system.
Allows for credit limits and available balances to be set based on requirements.
Higher debit order success rate with non-authenticated early debit orders (Naedos), used in conjunction with Host-to-host.
Download transactions directly onto a line-of-business system with Final Transaction Information (FTI), which allows for effortless transaction reconciliation.
Validate account numbers before payment submissions, using account verification files.
benefits: Allows for improved turnaround time and security.
Ensures complete control over financial and cashflow management.
Reduces the risk of fraud and human error as it is fully automated.

products.name: NetBank Business
products.description: A fully secure, online business banking solution with a dual interface (internet and mobile app) that facilitates both financial and non-financial transactions.
products.shortDescription: NetBank Business is a secure electronic banking solution that is versatile and easy to use.
salesHighlights: Financial flexibility for all banking. From transfers, payments and notifications to collections, collectees and authorisations, with set controls and audit logs.
Easy administration enabling balance enquiries, batch searches, retrieval of transaction statements and cash management reports in a single interface.
benefits: Enables convenience in accessing NetBank Business anywhere, even on a mobile or tablet through the Nedbank App Suite™.
Advanced token security, along with software and hardware certificates and passwords, to keep your data safe.
Control – your business’s finances are always in your hands.
Integration into a line-of-business software for more efficient processing.

products.name: NedTreasury
products.description: Desktop access to all foreign exchange deals, inward and outward cross border payments and money market products in a secure, real-time, online environment.
products.shortDescription: A sophisticated, world-class electronic banking system that enables desktop access to foreign exchange deals.
salesHighlights: Real-time foreign exchange dealing, including spot and forward exchange contracts, partially and fully optional contracts.
Global payments and transfers in multiple currencies, all accessible online.
The capability to transact on foreign currency accounts.
The capability to receive and process incoming transfers electronically in real time.
Online balance-of-payments reporting and declarations.
Money market term transactions covering rand call and term deposits, as well as overnight loans.
benefits: A secure environment for transactions through advanced token technology.
Informed decisions by accessing information in real-time.
Increased efficiency with the reduction of manual application forms. Instructions are given with a single click.

productLines.name: SpecialisedSolutions
productLines.description: Solutions to help you manage your working capital.

products.name: Cash Management
products.description: A service which applies a nominal debit and credit interest rate which can then be offset across a structured group of transactional accounts and then paid or charged to a transactional account(s) as defined by the client.
products.shortDescription: A service which applies a nominal debit and credit interest rate which can then be offset across a structured group of transactional accounts.
salesHighlights: Optimises your interest - by setting off your debit against your credit positions, we can maximise your income orminimise the cost of borrowed funds.
Helps you avoid penalties - rule-based sweeping automates payments and transfers in a way that helps you avoidinterest charges and maintain minimum balances.
Gives one consolidated view - our multibank view gives you a snapshot of all your cash positions across local andglobal financial institutions
benefits: More control - reduced interest exposure and smart interest management means you can optimise your cash positions.
Accurate decisions - make informed decisions that ensure accountability.
Increased efficiency - automated sweeping rules means less errors and more efficient processing.

productCategories.name: GetFinance
productCategories.description: I need money to help me achieve my goals

productLines.name: AssetBasedFinance
productLines.description: A wide range of asset finance solutions.

products.name: Vehicle Finance
products.description: Grow your business with Nedbank's wide range of asset finance solutions. Whether you need finance for a corporate car fleet or commercial trucks, we can design finance packages that meet the unique needs of your business and its cashflow.
products.shortDescription: Grow your business with Nedbank's wide range of asset finance solutions.
salesHighlights: We specialise in providing tailor-made options to finance your asset purchases
Instalment Sale
Financial lease
Full maintenance leasing
Operating rental
Managed maintenance
Nedfleet
benefits: An instalment sale allows you to get your moveable durable goods on a repayment plan that suits your budget and take ownership of them only once they have been fully paid
With structured payments that meet your cashflow and flexibility at the end of the term, a financial lease lets you choose how and when to pay for assets.
Forget the frustration of vehicle administration and the associated costs. NedFleet’s full-maintenance lease solution keeps your maintenance smooth and steady, saving you both money and time.
Rent a vehicle for your operations for a fixed period, taking advantage of tax recoveries and transferring your risk at the end of your contract period.
If you're looking to reduce the costs, administration and downtime of your fleet vehicles, it's time to choose South Africa's leading managed-maintenance provider.
NedFleet is a full-service fleet management solution designed to save your business both money and time. It’s perfect for fleets of any size.

value: Assists clients with their daily cashflow
Provide bridging finance so clients can continue operating while waiting for incoming funds.

productLines.name: Loans
productLines.description: To start up, grow, offer flexibility or manage debt.

products.name: Overdraft
products.shortDescription: At times your business needs some cashflow flexibility – while you’re waiting for payments to come in, you need to make payments of your own. A Nedbank overdraft facility is the ideal solution, providing working capital finance and unlocking cashflow.
salesHighlights: Provides the flexibility to borrow or repay as and when your cashflow allows;
Making funds accessible quickly and easily through a variety of mechanisms
Calculating debit interest on the daily used amount only.
benefits: Easy access with electronic banking, ATMs and debit cards
Competitive, risk-based pricing

Immediate access – as soon as your current account is active, you can apply for an overdraft facility and, once approved and the preagreed conditions are met, the facility is made available immediately

value: Assists clients with their daily cashflow
Provide bridging finance so clients can continue operating while waiting for incoming funds.

productCategories.name: Invest
productCategories.description: I need my money to grow and work for me

productLines.name: Investment
productLines.description: Your interest rate will be calculated during the application process. Depending on our clients' identified strategic investment goals and objectives, we offer a comprehensive range of solutions

products.name: Call Investment
products.description: A call deposit is an investment account that earns interest while still allowing you immediate access to your money. This is ideal for businesses that want to earn competitive interest while having immediate access to and full control of the funds in the account.
products.shortDescription: An investment product that allows for the immediate depositing and withdrawal of funds without notice.
salesHighlights: Competitive interest rate.
Deposits or withdrawals using your digital platform are allowed if your account is loaded.
benefits: Instant access.
No monthly or transactional fees.
Dedicated investment specialist available to provide information on the product.

products.name: Term Investment
products.description: A term deposit is an investment account in which you can deposit funds for a fixed term and both your capital and interest rate are fixed throughout the investment term. On maturity a new rate and investment term can be negotiated, allowing you to keep abreast of market changes. This is the perfect account for your business if you want to invest a lump sum and will not require access to it for a specific period.
products.shortDescription: A fixed-investment product with a competitive interest rate. The investment period can range from 1 day to 12 months.
salesHighlights: Competitive interest rate.
Term can be from 1 day to 12 months.
Fixed interest rate for the agreed term of the investment.
benefits: No monthly or transactional fees.
Dedicated investment specialist available to provide information on the product.

productCategories.description: I need to protect and take care of my assets
